segments.source_content:
---
id: turbo-native-modules-ios
title: 'Turbo Native Modules: iOS'
---
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; import constants from '@site/core/TabsConstants';
Now it's time to write some iOS platform code to make sure `localStorage` survives after the application is closed.

translations.zh-hant: 現在是時候編寫一些 iOS 平台代碼，以確保 `localStorage` 在應用程式關閉後仍能保留。

segments.source_content: ## Prepare your Xcode Project

translations.zh-hant: ## 準備你的 Xcode 專案

segments.source_content: We need to prepare your iOS project using Xcode. After completing these **6 steps** you'll have `RCTNativeLocalStorage` that implements the generated `NativeLocalStorageSpec` interface.

translations.zh-hant: 我們需要使用 Xcode 準備你的 iOS 專案。完成以下 **6 個步驟** 後，你將擁有實現生成 `NativeLocalStorageSpec` 介面的 `RCTNativeLocalStorage`。

segments.source_content: 1. Open the CocoPods generated Xcode Workspace:

translations.zh-hant: 1. 開啟由 CocoPods 生成的 Xcode Workspace：

segments.source_content:
```bash
cd ios
open TurboModuleExample.xcworkspace
```
2. Right click on app and select New Group, call the new group `NativeLocalStorage`.

translations.zh-hant: 2. 右鍵點擊應用程式並選擇 New Group，將新群組命名為 `NativeLocalStorage`。

segments.source_content: 3. In the `NativeLocalStorage` group, create New→File from Template.

translations.zh-hant: 3. 在 `NativeLocalStorage` 群組中，建立 New→File from Template。

segments.source_content: 4. Use the Cocoa Touch Class.
5. Name the Cocoa Touch Class RCTNativeLocalStorage with the Objective-C language.

translations.zh-hant: 5. 將 Cocoa Touch Class 命名為 RCTNativeLocalStorage，並選擇 Objective-C 語言。

segments.source_content: 6. Rename RCTNativeLocalStorage.m → RCTNativeLocalStorage.mm making it an Objective-C++ file.

translations.zh-hant: 6. 將 RCTNativeLocalStorage.m 重新命名為 RCTNativeLocalStorage.mm，使其成為 Objective-C++ 檔案。

segments.source_content: ## Implement localStorage with NSUserDefaults

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用 NSUserDefaults 實現 localStorage

segments.source_content: Start by updating `RCTNativeLocalStorage.h`:
Then update our implementation to use `NSUserDefaults` with a custom [suite name](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation/nsuserdefaults/1409957-initwithsuitename).

translations.zh-hant: 然後更新我們的實現，使用帶有自定義 [suite name](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation/nsuserdefaults/1409957-initwithsuitename) 的 `NSUserDefaults`。

segments.source_content: Important things to note:

- `RCT_EXPORT_MODULE` exports and registers the module using the identifier we'll use to access it in the JavaScript environment: `NativeLocalStorage`. See these [docs](./legacy/native-modules-ios#module-name) for more details.
- You can use Xcode to jump to the Codegen `@protocol NativeLocalStorageSpec`. You can also use Xcode to generate stubs for you.

translations.zh-hant:
- `RCT_EXPORT_MODULE` 使用我們在 JavaScript 環境中訪問模組的識別碼 `NativeLocalStorage` 來導出和註冊模組。詳情請參閱這些 [文件](./legacy/native-modules-ios#module-name)。
- 你可以使用 Xcode 跳轉到 Codegen 的 `@protocol NativeLocalStorageSpec`。你也可以使用 Xcode 為你生成存根。

segments.source_content: ## Build and run your code on a Simulator

translations.zh-hant: ## 在模擬器上建置並運行你的代碼

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">
```bash
npm run ios
```
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">
```bash
yarn run ios
```
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
